001package squidpony.squidmath;
002
003import static squidpony.squidmath.Noise.*;
004import static squidpony.squidmath.SeededNoise.*;
005
006/**
007 * "Classic Perlin" noise, as opposed to the Simplex Noise also created by Ken Perlin (which is produced by
008 * {@link SeededNoise}; both can be produced by {@link FastNoise}).
009 * This noise can in theory be scaled up to arbitrary dimensions, but in practice uses unreasonably hefty amounts of
010 * memory when dimensionality exceeds 10 or so, since it needs to hash {@code Math.pow(2, dimensionality)} points per
011 * sample of noise, which involves over a thousand points in 10 dimensions and over a million points in 20 dimensions.
012 * For that reason, it's limited to 6D noise here, and also implements 2D, 3D, and 4D. Its performance is surprisingly
013 * good at 2D, 3D, and 4D but trails off quickly at 6D. Its quality is worse than normal simplex noise in 2D, but you
014 * can use {@link JitterNoise} (which takes the same algorithm and distorts the grid pseudo-randomly) to get unusually
015 * high-quality 2D noise. The quality is actually quite good in 4D and higher; there's often some rhythmic patterns in
016 * 3D when time is z, but with 4 or 6 dimensions this can have fewer artifacts than Simplex in the same dimension. The
017 * 3D and higher dimensionality versions don't seem to need jitter to avoid grid artifacts, at least most of the time.
018 * This uses different gradient vectors than what was recommended in the "Improved Perlin Noise" paper, since the ones
019 * this uses avoid 45-degree angular artifacts in all dimensions implemented.
020 * <br>
021 * ClassicNoise is a good choice with parts of {@link squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.WorldMapGenerator} that need a
022 * Noise3D implementation, and it tends to about as fast as {@link SeededNoise} in 3D. It is not recommended for 2D
023 * use; prefer {@link JitterNoise} or {@link SeededNoise} for that. You can also use {@link FastNoise} with
024 * {@link FastNoise#PERLIN_FRACTAL} as the noiseType if you primarily want to use float input and get float output.
025 * If you want higher-dimensional noise than this supports, you can use {@link PhantomNoise}.
026 */
027public class ClassicNoise implements Noise.Noise2D, Noise.Noise3D, Noise.Noise4D, Noise.Noise5D, Noise.Noise6D {
028    public static final ClassicNoise instance = new ClassicNoise();
029    public long seed;
030    public ClassicNoise() {
031        this(0x1337BEEFCAFEL);
032    }
033
034    public ClassicNoise(final long seed) {
035        this.seed = seed;
036    }
037    //0xE60E2B722B53AEEBL, 0xCEBD76D9EDB6A8EFL, 0xB9C9AA3A51D00B65L, 0xA6F5777F6F88983FL, 0x9609C71EB7D03F7BL, 0x86D516E50B04AB1BL
038    protected static double gradCoord2D(long seed, int x, int y,
039                                        double xd, double yd) {
040        final int hash = (int)((seed ^= 0xE60E2B722B53AEEBL * x ^ 0xCEBD76D9EDB6A8EFL * y) * (seed) >>> 56);
041        final double[] grad = grad2d[hash];
042        return xd * grad[0] + yd * grad[1];
043    }
044    protected static double gradCoord3D(long seed, int x, int y, int z, double xd, double yd, double zd) {
045        final int hash =
046                (int)((seed ^= 0xE60E2B722B53AEEBL * x ^ 0xCEBD76D9EDB6A8EFL * y ^ 0xB9C9AA3A51D00B65L * z) * (seed)
047                        >>> 59) * 3;
048        return (xd * grad3d[hash] + yd * grad3d[hash + 1] + zd * grad3d[hash + 2]);
049    }
050    protected static double gradCoord4D(long seed, int x, int y, int z, int w,
051                                        double xd, double yd, double zd, double wd) {
052        final int hash =
053                (int) ((seed ^= 0xE60E2B722B53AEEBL * x ^ 0xCEBD76D9EDB6A8EFL * y ^ 0xB9C9AA3A51D00B65L * z ^ 0xA6F5777F6F88983FL * w) * (seed)
054                        >>> 56) & -4;
055        return xd * grad4d[hash] + yd * grad4d[hash + 1] + zd * grad4d[hash + 2] + wd * grad4d[hash + 3];
056    }
057    protected static double gradCoord5D(long seed, int x, int y, int z, int w, int u,
058                                        double xd, double yd, double zd, double wd, double ud) {
059        final int hash =
060                (int)((seed ^= 0xE60E2B722B53AEEBL * x ^ 0xCEBD76D9EDB6A8EFL * y ^ 0xB9C9AA3A51D00B65L * z ^ 0xA6F5777F6F88983FL * w ^ 0x9609C71EB7D03F7BL * u)
061                        * (seed) >>> 56) * 5;
062        return xd * grad5d[hash] + yd * grad5d[hash + 1] + zd * grad5d[hash + 2]
063                + wd * grad5d[hash + 3] + ud * grad5d[hash + 4];
064    }
065    
066    protected static double gradCoord6D(long seed, int x, int y, int z, int w, int u, int v,
067                                        double xd, double yd, double zd, double wd, double ud, double vd) {
068        final int hash =
069                (int)(
070                        (seed ^= 0xE60E2B722B53AEEBL * x ^ 0xCEBD76D9EDB6A8EFL * y ^ 0xB9C9AA3A51D00B65L *
071                                z ^ 0xA6F5777F6F88983FL * w ^ 0x9609C71EB7D03F7BL * u ^ 0x86D516E50B04AB1BL * v) * (seed)
072                        >>> 56) * 6;
073        return xd * grad6d[hash] + yd * grad6d[hash + 1] + zd * grad6d[hash + 2]
074                + wd * grad6d[hash + 3] + ud * grad6d[hash + 4] + vd * grad6d[hash + 5];
075    }
076    
077    
078//    protected static double gradCoord2DJitter(long seed, int x, int y,
079//                                              double xd, double yd) {
080//        final int hash = ((int)(((seed ^= 0xB4C4D * x ^ 0xEE2C3 * y) ^ seed >>> 13) * (seed)));
081//        final double[] grad = phiGrad2[hash >>> 24], jitter = phiGrad2[hash >>> 16 & 0xFF];
082//        return (xd + jitter[0] * 0.5) * grad[0] + (yd + jitter[1] * 0.5) * grad[1];
083//    }
084
085    @Override
086    public double getNoise(final double x, final double y) {
087        return getNoiseWithSeed(x, y, seed);
088    }
089
090    @Override
091    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, final long seed) {
092        x *= 2.0;
093        y *= 2.0;
094        final int
095                x0 = fastFloor(x),
096                y0 = fastFloor(y);
097        final double xf = x - x0, yf = y - y0;
098        final double xa = Noise.emphasize(xf), ya = Noise.emphasize(yf);
099//        final double res =
100        return
101                Noise.emphasizeSigned(lerp(lerp(gradCoord2D(seed, x0, y0, xf, yf), gradCoord2D(seed, x0+1, y0, xf - 1, yf), xa),
102                                lerp(gradCoord2D(seed, x0, y0+1, xf, yf-1), gradCoord2D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, xf - 1, yf - 1), xa),
103                                ya) * 1.4142);//* 0.875;// * 1.4142;
104//        if(res < -1.0 || res > 1.0) System.out.println(res);
105//        return res;
106    }
107
108    @Override
109    public double getNoise(final double x, final double y, final double z) {
110        return getNoiseWithSeed(x, y, z, seed);
111    }
112
113    @Override
114    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, final long seed) {
115        x *= 2.0;
116        y *= 2.0;
117        z *= 2.0;
118        final int
119                x0 = fastFloor(x),
120                y0 = fastFloor(y),
121                z0 = fastFloor(z);
122        final double xf = x - x0, yf = y - y0, zf = z - z0;
123        final double xa = Noise.emphasize(xf), ya = Noise.emphasize(yf), za = Noise.emphasize(zf);
124//        final double res =
125         return
126                 Noise.emphasizeSigned(
127                         lerp(
128                                 lerp(
129                                         lerp(
130                                                 gradCoord3D(seed, x0, y0, z0, xf, yf, zf),
131                                                 gradCoord3D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0, xf - 1, yf, zf),
132                                                 xa),
133                                         lerp(
134                                                 gradCoord3D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0, xf, yf-1, zf),
135                                                 gradCoord3D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0, xf - 1, yf - 1, zf),
136                                                 xa),
137                                         ya),
138                                 lerp(
139                                         lerp(
140                                                 gradCoord3D(seed, x0, y0, z0+1, xf, yf, zf-1),
141                                                 gradCoord3D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0+1, xf - 1, yf, zf-1),
142                                                 xa),
143                                         lerp(
144                                                 gradCoord3D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0+1, xf, yf-1, zf-1),
145                                                 gradCoord3D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0+1, xf - 1, yf - 1, zf-1),
146                                                 xa),
147                                         ya),
148                                 za) * 1.0625);
149//        if(res < -1 || res > 1) System.out.println(res);
150//        return res;
151    }
152
153    @Override
154    public double getNoise(final double x, final double y, final double z, final double w) {
155        return getNoiseWithSeed(x, y, z, w, seed);
156    }
157
158    @Override
159    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, double w, final long seed) {
160        x *= 2.0;
161        y *= 2.0;
162        z *= 2.0;
163        w *= 2.0;
164        final int
165                x0 = fastFloor(x),
166                y0 = fastFloor(y),
167                z0 = fastFloor(z),
168                w0 = fastFloor(w);
169        final double xf = x - x0, yf = y - y0, zf = z - z0, wf = w - w0;
170        final double xa = Noise.emphasize(xf), ya = Noise.emphasize(yf), za = Noise.emphasize(zf), wa = Noise.emphasize(wf);
171//        final double res =
172        return
173                Noise.emphasizeSigned(
174                        lerp(
175                                lerp(
176                                        lerp(
177                                                lerp(
178                                                        gradCoord4D(seed, x0, y0, z0, w0, xf, yf, zf, wf),
179                                                        gradCoord4D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0, w0, xf - 1, yf, zf, wf),
180                                                        xa),
181                                                lerp(
182                                                        gradCoord4D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0, w0, xf, yf-1, zf, wf),
183                                                        gradCoord4D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0, w0, xf - 1, yf - 1, zf, wf),
184                                                        xa),
185                                                ya),
186                                        lerp(
187                                                lerp(
188                                                        gradCoord4D(seed, x0, y0, z0+1, w0, xf, yf, zf-1, wf),
189                                                        gradCoord4D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0+1, w0, xf - 1, yf, zf-1, wf),
190                                                        xa),
191                                                lerp(
192                                                        gradCoord4D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0+1, w0, xf, yf-1, zf-1, wf),
193                                                        gradCoord4D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0+1, w0, xf - 1, yf - 1, zf-1, wf),
194                                                        xa),
195                                                ya),
196                                        za),
197                                lerp(
198                                        lerp(
199                                                lerp(
200                                                        gradCoord4D(seed, x0, y0, z0, w0+1, xf, yf, zf, wf - 1),
201                                                        gradCoord4D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0, w0+1, xf - 1, yf, zf, wf - 1),
202                                                        xa),
203                                                lerp(
204                                                        gradCoord4D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0, w0+1, xf, yf-1, zf, wf - 1),
205                                                        gradCoord4D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0, w0+1, xf - 1, yf - 1, zf, wf - 1),
206                                                        xa),
207                                                ya),
208                                        lerp(
209                                                lerp(
210                                                        gradCoord4D(seed, x0, y0, z0+1, w0+1, xf, yf, zf-1, wf - 1),
211                                                        gradCoord4D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0+1, w0+1, xf - 1, yf, zf-1, wf - 1),
212                                                        xa),
213                                                lerp(
214                                                        gradCoord4D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0+1, w0+1, xf, yf-1, zf-1, wf - 1),
215                                                        gradCoord4D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0+1, w0+1, xf - 1, yf - 1, zf-1, wf - 1),
216                                                        xa),
217                                                ya),
218                                        za),
219                                wa) * 0.555);
220//        if(res < -1 || res > 1) System.out.println(res);
221//        return res;
222    }
223
224
225    @Override
226    public double getNoise(final double x, final double y, final double z, final double w, final double u) {
227        return getNoiseWithSeed(x, y, z, w, u, seed);
228    }
229
230    @Override
231    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u, long seed) {
232        x *= 2.0;
233        y *= 2.0;
234        z *= 2.0;
235        w *= 2.0;
236        u *= 2.0;
237        final int
238                x0 = fastFloor(x),
239                y0 = fastFloor(y),
240                z0 = fastFloor(z),
241                w0 = fastFloor(w),
242                u0 = fastFloor(u);
243        final double xf = x - x0, yf = y - y0, zf = z - z0, wf = w - w0, uf = u - u0;
244        //ad * ad * ad * (ad * (ad * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0)
245        final double xa = xf * xf * xf * (xf * (xf * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
246        final double ya = yf * yf * yf * (yf * (yf * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
247        final double za = zf * zf * zf * (zf * (zf * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
248        final double wa = wf * wf * wf * (wf * (wf * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
249        final double ua = uf * uf * uf * (uf * (uf * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
250//
251//        final double xa = xf * xf * (3.0 - 2.0 * xf);
252//        final double ya = yf * yf * (3.0 - 2.0 * yf);
253//        final double za = zf * zf * (3.0 - 2.0 * zf);
254//        final double wa = wf * wf * (3.0 - 2.0 * wf);
255//        final double ua = uf * uf * (3.0 - 2.0 * uf);
256//
257//        final double res =
258        return
259                Noise.emphasizeSigned(
260                lerp(lerp(
261                        lerp(
262                                lerp(
263                                        lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0, z0, w0, u0, xf, yf, zf, wf, uf),
264                                                gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0, w0, u0, xf-1, yf, zf, wf, uf), xa),
265                                        lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0, w0, u0, xf, yf-1, zf, wf, uf),
266                                                gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0, w0, u0, xf-1, yf-1, zf, wf, uf), xa),
267                                        ya),
268                                lerp(
269                                        lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0, z0+1, w0, u0, xf, yf, zf-1, wf, uf),
270                                                gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0+1, w0, u0, xf-1, yf, zf-1, wf, uf), xa),
271                                        lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0+1, w0, u0, xf, yf-1, zf-1, wf, uf),
272                                                gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0+1, w0, u0, xf-1, yf-1, zf-1, wf, uf), xa),
273                                        ya),
274                                za),
275                        lerp(
276                                lerp(
277                                        lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0, z0, w0+1, u0, xf, yf, zf, wf-1, uf),
278                                                gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0, w0+1, u0, xf-1, yf, zf, wf-1, uf), xa),
279                                        lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0, w0+1, u0, xf, yf-1, zf, wf-1, uf),
280                                                gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0, w0+1, u0, xf-1, yf-1, zf, wf-1, uf), xa),
281                                        ya),
282                                lerp(
283                                        lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0, z0+1, w0+1, u0, xf, yf, zf-1, wf-1, uf),
284                                                gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0+1, w0+1, u0, xf-1, yf, zf-1, wf-1, uf), xa),
285                                        lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0+1, w0+1, u0, xf, yf-1, zf-1, wf-1, uf),
286                                                gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0+1, w0+1, u0, xf-1, yf-1, zf-1, wf-1, uf), xa),
287                                        ya),
288                                za),
289                        wa),
290                        lerp(
291                                lerp(
292                                        lerp(
293                                                lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0, z0, w0, u0+1, xf, yf, zf, wf, uf-1),
294                                                        gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0, w0, u0+1, xf-1, yf, zf, wf, uf-1), xa),
295                                                lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0, w0, u0+1, xf, yf-1, zf, wf, uf-1),
296                                                        gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0, w0, u0+1, xf-1, yf-1, zf, wf, uf-1), xa),
297                                                ya),
298                                        lerp(
299                                                lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0, z0+1, w0, u0+1, xf, yf, zf-1, wf, uf-1),
300                                                        gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0+1, w0, u0+1, xf-1, yf, zf-1, wf, uf-1), xa),
301                                                lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0+1, w0, u0+1, xf, yf-1, zf-1, wf, uf-1),
302                                                        gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0+1, w0, u0+1, xf-1, yf-1, zf-1, wf, uf-1), xa),
303                                                ya),
304                                        za),
305                                lerp(
306                                        lerp(
307                                                lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0, z0, w0+1, u0+1, xf, yf, zf, wf-1, uf-1),
308                                                        gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0, w0+1, u0+1, xf-1, yf, zf, wf-1, uf-1), xa),
309                                                lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0, w0+1, u0+1, xf, yf-1, zf, wf-1, uf-1),
310                                                        gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0, w0+1, u0+1, xf-1, yf-1, zf, wf-1, uf-1), xa),
311                                                ya),
312                                        lerp(
313                                                lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0, z0+1, w0+1, u0+1, xf, yf, zf-1, wf-1, uf-1),
314                                                        gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0, z0+1, w0+1, u0+1, xf-1, yf, zf-1, wf-1, uf-1), xa),
315                                                lerp(gradCoord5D(seed, x0, y0+1, z0+1, w0+1, u0+1, xf, yf-1, zf-1, wf-1, uf-1),
316                                                        gradCoord5D(seed, x0+1, y0+1, z0+1, w0+1, u0+1, xf-1, yf-1, zf-1, wf-1, uf-1), xa),
317                                                ya),
318                                        za),
319                                wa),
320                        ua) * 0.7777777 );
321//        if(res < -1 || res > 1) System.out.println(res);
322//        return res;
323    }
324
325    @Override
326    public double getNoise(final double x, final double y, final double z, final double w, final double u, final double v) {
327        return getNoiseWithSeed(x, y, z, w, u, v, seed);
328    }
329
330    @Override
331    public double getNoiseWithSeed(double x, double y, double z, double w, double u, double v, long seed) {
332        x *= 2.0;
333        y *= 2.0;
334        z *= 2.0;
335        w *= 2.0;
336        u *= 2.0;
337        v *= 2.0;
338        final int
339                x0 = fastFloor(x),
340                y0 = fastFloor(y),
341                z0 = fastFloor(z),
342                w0 = fastFloor(w),
343                u0 = fastFloor(u),
344                v0 = fastFloor(v);
345        final double xf = x - x0, yf = y - y0, zf = z - z0, wf = w - w0, uf = u - u0, vf = v - v0;
346        final double xa = xf * xf * xf * (xf * (xf * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
347        final double ya = yf * yf * yf * (yf * (yf * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
348        final double za = zf * zf * zf * (zf * (zf * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
349        final double wa = wf * wf * wf * (wf * (wf * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
350        final double ua = uf * uf * uf * (uf * (uf * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
351        final double va = vf * vf * vf * (vf * (vf * 6.0 - 15.0) + 10.0);
352//        final double res =
353        return Noise.emphasizeSigned(
354                lerp(
355                        lerp(
356                                lerp(
357                                        lerp(
358                                                lerp(
359                                                        lerp(gradCoord6D(seed, x0, y0, z0, w0, u0, v0, xf, yf, zf, wf, uf, vf),
360                                                                gradCoord6D(seed, x0 + 1, y0, z0, w0, u0, v0, xf - 1, yf, zf, wf, uf, vf), xa),
361                                                        lerp(gradCoord6D(seed, x0, y0 + 1, z0, w0, u0, v0, xf, yf - 1, zf, wf, uf, vf),
362                                                                gradCoord6D(seed, x0 + 1, y0 + 1, z0, w0, u0, v0, xf - 1, yf - 1, zf, wf, uf, vf), xa),
363                                                        ya),
364                                                lerp(
365                                                        lerp(gradCoord6D(seed, x0, y0, z0 + 1, w0, u0, v0, xf, yf, zf - 1, wf, uf, vf),
366                                                                gradCoord6D(seed, x0 + 1, y0, z0 + 1, w0, u0, v0, xf - 1, yf, zf - 1, wf, uf, vf), xa),
367                                                        lerp(gradCoord6D(seed, x0, y0 + 1, z0 + 1, w0, u0, v0, xf, yf - 1, zf - 1, wf, uf, vf),
